sentences.sContent: When you call me Arab, I say yes.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you call me Arab, I say yes.
sentences.sCn: 当你叫我阿拉伯人的时候，我说是。

sentences.sContent: What of the last in the Arab 2011?
sentences.sContent_eng: What of the last in the Arab 2011?
sentences.sCn: 在2011年的阿拉伯，后一种是什么呢？

sentences.sContent: France, he said, should not fear change in the Arab world; for the first time in history, democratic ideals “could triumph on all shores of the Mediterranean”.
sentences.sContent_eng: France, he said, should not fear change in the Arab world; for the first time in history, democratic ideals “could triumph on all shores of the Mediterranean”.
sentences.sCn: 萨科奇说，法国不应惧怕阿拉伯世界的转变；在历史上第一次民主的思想“可以在地中海沿岸的所有国家取得胜利。”

phrases.pCn: n. 阿拉伯联合酋长国
阿拉伯联盟（全称League of Arab States）
n. 阿拉伯塔酒店（又名帆船饭店，位于迪拜）

trans.tranOther: someone whose language is Arabic and whose family comes from, or originally came from, the Middle East or North Africa
